structure.unit: STATE AND AREA PLANNING -- REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT

law.text: The provisions of KRS 147.610 through 147.705 shall be construed to confer on the area planning commission an advisory capacity only.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 253, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 359, sec. 3.
